channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: I want to run a 508 server but when I hit the 'All' script it says cannot find the path specified for everything. Does this matter or do I need to fix it. If I need to fix it how do I?

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

to run it…u need to click on the run.bat your source should have one…and if a .bat file is not find the path speclified its probably not recogniseing your java version…

to fix the all one right click on the file and click edit
you should see one of these somewheres

jdk1.6.0_X
jre1.6.0_X

The x is filled in with a number from 1-13 probably…if u knwo what java version u have put the code in for which u have with either jre or jdk and the version update which is the number that goes in for x

Read full topic
